title: Metal Gear Solid cutscenes
description:
I take no credits for this. Someone did all the editing and recording. I just found it on the net and bungle it together.

The package contains all cutscenens and story codec moments for all the MGS games including the latest MGS4. In the right order of course, edited to make it like a long as hell movie. If you don&#039;t have the game and just want a peace of the whole MGS story and universe this is the shortcut.

Quality is ok. Much much better than shitty youtube. NOTE! Some codec moments linked to the story might be missing. But it&#039;s hard to keep track of them all I guess. Either way, is pretty cool to watch if you are a MGS fan.


If you don&#039;t want to download the whole 10.7 GB you can just select the files of interest.

Torrent content:

MGS Twin Snakes CD1.avi
MGS Twin Snakes CD2.avi
MGS Twin Snakes CD3.avi
MGS Sons Of Liberty CD0.avi
MGS Sons Of Liberty CD1.avi
MGS Sons Of Liberty CD2.avi
MGS Sons Of Liberty CD3.avi
MGS Snake Eater CD0.avi
MGS Snake Eater CD1.avi
MGS Snake Eater CD2.avi
MGS Snake Eater CD3.avi
01. Metal Gear Solid 4 - Guns of the Patriots (Act 1).wmv
02. Metal Gear Solid 4 - Guns of the Patriots (Act 2).wmv
03. Metal Gear Solid 4 - Guns of the Patriots (Act 3).wmv
04. Metal Gear Solid 4 - Guns of the Patriots (Act 4).wmv
05. Metal Gear Solid 4 - Guns of the Patriots (Act 5).wmv

AND KEEP SEEDING!
